akn:content.akn:p:
§ 31103. Applicable procedure A civil action under this chapter is subject to the provisions of chapter 309 of this title except to the extent inconsistent with this chapter. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 6(c), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1521.)
